snippet.title: PUBG: BLINDSPOT | Official Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Project ARC now has its official name, PUBG: Blindspot


PUBG: Blindspot will be participating in Steam Next Fest starting from February 21, 2025, with a playable demo

This demo version allows players to experience the current gameplay of PUBG: Blindspot, which is being developed by the ARC Team at PUBG Studios.

We sincerely appreciate your continued support and enthusiasm, 
and we will do our best to meet your expectations. 🙏

For more details, please check out the official store page of the full game, 
and don’t forget to add it to your wishlist!

▶Steam page Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3446700
